backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, registrations, OTP generation/verification, and admin authentication with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two print‑sanitization features to their related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend registration and admin components, validation logic, styles, and print‑safety behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, with global border and body background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading Orbitron font and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing splash screen, switching between registration flow and admin panel, and resetting registration state when returning from admin.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced‑motion support, auto‑dismiss logic, and optional skip button.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel handling identity login, admin role checks, registration fetching/editing/deleting, and admin setup code or password login flows.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Provides a UI for admins to regain access using either a setup code or username/password, handling form state, validation, and visual feedback.
Error boundary component that catches rendering failures in admin detail views and offers a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Displays document previews with loading, error handling, and retry logic, falling back to a placeholder when a blob is missing or invalid.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration details with change detection, controlled inputs, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Shows detailed registration data with loading, error, empty, and selection states, plus actions like edit, refetch, and delete.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation hook for admin password login that normalizes backend errors and refreshes admin-related queries on success.
Provides admin-related React Query hooks for checking admin status, fetching roles and registrations, and resiliently fetching registration details.
Stores an admin setup code, reinitializes the actor, and aggressively refreshes admin-related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that catches step failures and shows a recovery UI with technical details and refresh option.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Implements a double‑click/tap detection hook that shows hints and triggers a callback on successful double interaction.
Defines mutations for OTP generation/verification and submits registration data with file-to-blob conversion.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Manages the multi‑step customer registration flow, validation state, and hidden double‑interaction navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Customer details form with validation, error display, and controlled state updates passed back via onValidationChange.
Handles phone-based OTP generation, verification, and final registration submission with UI states.
Displays terms, tracks acceptance with timestamp, and provides a sanitized print-friendly proof document.
Manages Aadhaar, PAN, and optional receipt uploads with previews and validation change updates.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured router and service terms for display in the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines customer details, document data, and step prop types used in registration steps.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer detail fields including name, phone, DOB, email, and address, returning error messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme color variables, global styles, admin panel forced-dark theme, and splash screen galaxy background/animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, container settings, custom keyframes, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature versions for the customer registration app.
